```
;;; Query input:
 (forward-reverse (a b c) ?what) 

;;; Query results:
 (FORWARD-REVERSE (A B C) (C B A)) 

;;; Query input:
 (forward-reverse ?what (a b c)) 

;;; Query results:
 ... infinite loop 
```

```
;;; Query input:
 (backward-reverse ?what (a b c)) 

;;; Query results:
 (BACKWARD-REVERSE (C B A) (A B C)) 

;;; Query input:
 (backward-reverse (a b c) ?what) 

;;; Query results:
 ... infinite loop 
```

```
;;; Query input:
 (reverse ?what (a b c)) 

;;; Query results:
 (REVERSE (C B A) (A B C)) 

;;; Query input:
 (reverse (a b c) ?what) 

;;; Query results:
 (REVERSE (A B C) (C B A)) 
```
